name: Installation
description:
Can't figure out the copy and paste installation? This service is an absolute as-is installation of your theme purchase. No additional theme customization is available. 

We will need your Big Cartel login information to install the theme so please send us a note with your payment or an email containing your username and password along with any non-product images that are required for the setup (for example the image on the home page of The Best Made Theme). 

This service only covers installing the theme (CSS and Page Code copy and paste) and does not include setup or creation of any products or custom pages.

name: Lefty
description: Lefty is a minimalist Big Cartel theme with a left sidebar. Change up your storefront without breaking the bank. Features: Left sidebar Big Cartel simple editor compatible (text, background, and link colors) Large navigation links Great fresh look Like the look but not sure how to install a theme? Check out how it works.

name: The Best Made Theme
description: Clean and sophisticated, use the Best Made theme to bring your storefront to life. Product photos will shine as customers browse your extensive selection of goods. Features: Top Navigation Bar Left Categories Sidebar Big Cartel simple editor compatible (text, background, and link colors) Homepage displays a lookbook or branding image of your choice Like the look but not sure how to install a theme? Check out how it works.

name: Awesome Big Cartel Theme
description:
We spent all month designing this Big Cartel theme just for you. Impress your customers and woo your friends and family with your professional storefront. 

With all the features a shop owner could ever want, this theme is sure to take your business to the next level.

name: Custom Banner 1
description:
Add a custom banner to your theme! Enter your company name during checkout and we will format it in this style and send it along. 

The image can be easily uploaded through the Big Cartel custom header upload form.
